channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Trust me, you have never seen a mini PC like this — Keebmon is a Ryzen AI-powered PC with a mechanical keyboard, a 21:9 touchscreen display, 64GB RAM, and an 8TB SSD
item.description: Keebmon is a “folding” mini PC combining a touchscreen, mechanical keyboard, and high-end Ryzen processor with extensive connectivity and upgrades.

item.title: Nvidia launches powerful new Rubin chip architecture
item.description: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang officially launched the company’s new Rubin computing architecture, which he described as the state of the art in AI computing.

item.title: Sony Afeela at CES 2026: Live updates from the Sony Honda Mobility press conference
item.description: Sony's CES 2026 press conference is imminent, and this year comes with a twist: Rather than an overview of Sony's electronics, video game and Hollywood studio plans for the new year, the presser will have a more narrow focus: electric vehicles. Sound odd? That's because the traditional end-of-press-day slot isn't just Sony, but rather Sony Honda Mobility — the joint venture responsible for the Afeela 1 electric car that has been showcased at CES for the better part of a decade. But this year, we'll get to see an all-new concept model at the event. How to watch the Sony Afeela CES 2026 press ...

item.title: US Awards Peter Thiel–Backed Nuclear Startup $900 Million
item.description: The U.S. Department of Energy announced today that it is awarding $2.7 billion to three companies to boost domestic uranium enrichment.

item.title: Lego’s New ‘Star Wars’ Smart Brick Sets Look Like a Big Risk
item.description: Lego is using the galaxy far, far away to launch one of its biggest innovations in years... and it's already raising eyebrows.

item.title: Boston Dynamics’s next-gen humanoid robot will have Google DeepMind DNA
item.description: Google's AI research lab is working with Boston Dynamics to make Atlas act more like a human.

item.title: Trump, RFK Jr. Are Officially Tearing Down the Childhood Vaccine Schedule
item.description: Vaccines for diseases like rotavirus and meningococcal disease will no longer be universally recommended by the CDC.

item.title: Nvidia launches Alpamayo, open AI models that allow autonomous vehicles to ‘think like a human’
item.description: Nvidia unveiled Alpamayo at CES 2026, which includes a reasoning vision language action model that allows an autonomous vehicle to think more like a human and provide chain-of-thought reasoning.

item.title: Taiwanese infrastructure suffered over 2.5 million Chinese cyberattacks per day in 2025, report reveals
item.description: It's all part of a "hybrid war" against the island, a report claims.

item.title: The Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra might not get any camera upgrades — but that's fine if it means we avoid a price hike
item.description: It seems that the Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra could launch with the same quad-camera system as last year’s model, but there could be an excellent reason for the lack of upgrade.

item.title: Nouveaux LEGO Star Wars avec briques « Smart Play » : voici « la plus grosse évolution depuis 50 ans »
item.description: C'est probablement l'annonce la plus excitante du CES 2026 pour les grands enfants que nous sommes (ou que je suis). LEGO lance le Smart Play. L'idée ? Une brique intelligente capable de détecter les mouvements et de communiquer avec les autres, sans l'horrible design des sets Mario. La marque promet la plus grosse évolution depuis 50 ans.

item.title: New NASA Chief Pushes Back on Claims Agency Is Trashing Its History
item.description: Following reports that closing the agency’s largest research library would result in the loss of precious scientific and historic materials, Jared Isaacman wants to set the record straight.

item.title: Viral Reddit post critical of food delivery apps may have been AI-generated
item.description: A viral Reddit post purportedly from an employee of a "major food delivery app" may actually be an AI-generated hoax, The Verge reports. The post itself, and an image of an employee ID card the poster, u/trowaway_whistleblow, shared with The Verge, where both flagged as being likely AI-generated when run through online AI detectors and AI assistants like Gemini and Claude.Given the inflammatory nature of the post, it's not hard to see why it received over 80,000 upvotes in the four days it's been up in r/confession. The post includes a series of striking claims about the unnamed food delivery ...

item.title: SanDisk enterre les SSD WD Black et WD Blue : voici la nouvelle gamme Optimus
item.description: Vous connaissez forcément les WD Black, ces SSD noirs légendaires ? C'est fini. SanDisk a décidé de tout raser au CES 2026. La marque culte disparaît au profit d'une nouvelle identité : Optimus. Et derrière ce changement de nom se cache une réalité économique bien moins sympathique.

item.title: The Biggest Debate in ‘Stranger Things 5’: Were There 3 Waterfalls?
item.description: Mike and Eleven wanted to go somewhere with three waterfalls, but did that actually happen?

item.title: Google Gemini Is Taking Control of Humanoid Robots on Auto Factory Floors
item.description: Google DeepMind and Boston Dynamics are teaming up to integrate Gemini into a humanoid robot called Atlas.

item.title: Boston Dynamics’ Tesla Bot rival Atlas will start building Hyundai cars in 2028
item.description: Boston Dynamics unveiled the latest version of its humanoid Atlas robot Monday at CES in Las Vegas. The robot, with a glowing circle for a face, a fully electric, battery-powered body, and joints that can rotate 360 degrees, is so advanced that it will soon be working alongside human factory workers for parent company Hyundai, […]

item.title: Boston Dynamics' Atlas humanoid robot is now a product and heading to factories in 2028
item.description: A big leap from prototype to coworker – the robo-future is coming

item.title: This smart mirror was a menace at CES 2026
item.description: Imagine walking into CES 2026, sitting down in front of a smart mirror, taking a 30-second selfie, and getting a score for how well you're aging. Well, last night, a bunch of other tech journalists did just that. I witnessed some journalists take critical damage to their self-esteem. Others wiped their brow in relief. Yours […]

item.title: CES 2026 live updates: See the latest news, surprises, and strange tech from LG, Samsung, Lego, and new startups
item.description: CES 2026 is finally here, and Mashable reporters are on the ground looking for the best in show. Get live updates from the showroom floor and behind the scenes.

item.title: TCL unveils its X11L SQD-Mini LED TVs at CES 2026
item.description: TCL introduced the next entry in its flagship line of televisions during CES. The X11L SQD-Mini LED Series is available for pre-order now in three sizes. But like much of the gear on show in Las Vegas this week, it doesn't come cheap. The 75-inch model of the X11L costs $7,000, the 85-inch option is $8,000 and the 98-inch model goes for $10,000. That’s more than double the costs of the QD-Mini LED TV the brand unveiled at last year’s CES. The most notable addition in TCL's latest screen is the company's new Deep Color System. This tech leverages Super Quantum Dots, combined with its CSOT Ultra...

item.title: Why is TikTok so obsessed with 365 buttons?
item.description: One TikTokker said they planned to save a button a day in 2026, totaling 365 buttons. It sparked a whole thing.

item.title: Deepfake AI Pastors Are Stealing From Churchgoers: Report
item.description: In the name of the Slop God.

item.title: 5 new gadgets from CES 2026 that you can buy right now
item.description: CES 2026 is still getting started, but a handful of new gadgets are already available to buy as of Jan. 5. Shop drops from Xreal, TCL, and more.

item.title: Lego Smart Bricks introduce a new way to build — and they don’t require screens
item.description: Lego developed a custom ASIC chip that allows its new Ssmart Bricks to pick up on signals from surrounding Smart Tags that dictate how it should make sounds or light up.

item.title: Solar Orbiter Sets Record Watching Sunspot Region That Sparked Global Auroras
item.description: Scientists observed the most active solar region in decades for a record-breaking 94 days.
